title: Jackie Robinson: "I can't stand singing an anthem. I can't salute science.
subtitle: An African-American baseball major, Jackie Robinson, wrote in his resume that he couldn't sing an anthem or revive science because "I know I'm a black man in a white world."
author: David Emery
vclaim: The baseball player Jackie Robinson said, "I can't stand singing an anthem. I can't salute science, I know I'm a black man in a white world."
